name: Don't Die in Your Sleep
description:
I've always had nightmares, they're just more scary now. They're so realistic it feels like I actually could get hurt if the monsters get me...  I don't want to go to sleep, because I only wake up in another nightmare, time and time again.  

Why do I get them? 

Play as Daisy and help her overcome her nightmares by defeating them in this roguelike 3D shooter. Choose between three different projectiles with unique characteristics as you fight your way through the level. 

With randomly generated levels Daisy's dreams will look different each time you play. The two levels both have exclusive enemies and a boss that follows their respective themes. Fight your way to the final boss and succeed in helping Daisy overcome her trauma.

Don’t Die in Your Sleep features…

  • Three different playstyles
  • Three unique bosses 
  • Randomly generated levels

Level Design: Nimo Grassman, Vilma Löfgren

Graphics: Emma Blomstrand, Vilma Löfgren, Trey Tallberg 

Scripting: Yaser Al Shemerty, Nimo Grassman

Press the download button further down on the site and open the zip-file with the zip-tool of your choice. Run the “Don_t Die in Your Sleep.exe”.

Minimum system requirements

  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8GB Ram
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) Vega 8 Mobile Graphics
  • Storage: 201 MB
